share on x ep eugene r phillips. jun 21 at 9:38 pm noralea and gene phillips purchased the arrive in style for the family of etheridge milton killion. share on x micah killion. jun 21 at 9:13 pm 1 file added to the album etheridge killion 1930 - 2015 comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x micah killion. jun 21 at 9:13 pm 1 file added to the album etheridge killion 1930 - 2015 comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x cm charlotte maddux. jun 21 at 1:25 pm mr. killion was a good friend to us all here at morningside of cullman. he enjoyed taking part in activities and spending time talking with one good friend mr. copeland. he became a special friend to my little grandson who is 4 years old. he became a part of our family here at morningside and he will be missed by all. he talked often about his sons and we pray god will help you through the loss of your father. may god shower his blessing on you. charlotte maddux activity director at morningside of cullman. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x more memories... visitation. jun 23. 10:00 am - 11:00 am arab heritage memorial chapel1340 north main street. arab, al, us, 35016. get order flowers now for etheridge's visitation service. jun 23. 11:00 am arab heritage memorial chapel1340 north main street. arab, al, us, 35016. get order flowers now for etheridge's service etheridge killion 1930 - 2015 etheridge killion 1930 - 2015 arab heritage memorial chapel website designed by funeralone contact obituaries about store
